languages.text: Вальц чувствует от вас угрозу: он знает по себе, насколько опасен человек, которого не смогли сломать чудовищные мучения.
Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.
languages.original_text: Вальц чувствует от вас угрозу: он знает по себе, насколько опасен человек, которого не смогли сломать чудовищные мучения.

traits.locale_text: Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.
Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.
Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.
Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.
Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.

languages.text: ワルツはあなたからの脅威を感じ取っている。あなたは想像を絶する拷問ですら屈しなかった。それだけであなたがどれだけ危険な存在なのか、彼はよく理解している。
languages.original_text: Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.

traits.locale_text: ワルツはあなたからの脅威を感じ取っている。あなたは想像を絶する拷問ですら屈しなかった。それだけであなたがどれだけ危険な存在なのか、彼はよく理解している。

languages.text: Walz spürt die Bedrohung durch dich. Die monströse Folter hat dich nicht gebrochen – er weiß nur zu gut, wie gefährlich dich das macht.
languages.original_text: Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.

traits.locale_text: Walz spürt die Bedrohung durch dich. Die monströse Folter hat dich nicht gebrochen – er weiß nur zu gut, wie gefährlich dich das macht.

languages.text: Walz, tehditkâr kudretini sezmiş durumda. En dehşet işkenceler bile iradeni kıramayınca ne denli tehlikeli olduğunun farkına vardı.
languages.original_text: Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.

traits.locale_text: Walz, tehditkâr kudretini sezmiş durumda. En dehşet işkenceler bile iradeni kıramayınca ne denli tehlikeli olduğunun farkına vardı.

languages.text: Walz percibe la amenaza que representas. Una monstruosa tortura no ha bastado para quebrantarte, y sabe que eso significa que eres un grave peligro.
languages.original_text: Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.

traits.locale_text: Walz percibe la amenaza que representas. Una monstruosa tortura no ha bastado para quebrantarte, y sabe que eso significa que eres un grave peligro.

languages.text: 沃尔茨感觉到了你身上散发的威胁。即便是可怕的折磨也无法将你摧垮，他很清楚这样的磨难会把你变成多么危险的人。
languages.original_text: Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.

traits.locale_text: 沃尔茨感觉到了你身上散发的威胁。即便是可怕的折磨也无法将你摧垮，他很清楚这样的磨难会把你变成多么危险的人。

languages.text: Walz comprend la menace que vous représentez. Une torture monstrueuse ne suffira pas à vous briser, il a conscience que cela ne ferait que vous rendre encore plus redoutable.
languages.original_text: Walz senses the threat you pose. You could not be broken by monstrous torture — he knows too well how dangerous that makes you.

traits.locale_text: Walz comprend la menace que vous représentez. Une torture monstrueuse ne suffira pas à vous briser, il a conscience que cela ne ferait que vous rendre encore plus redoutable.
